alert.note: Alert for Morrill; Scotts Bluff (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Cheyenne (Southeastern Wyoming and Western Nebraska)
info.headline: Wind Chill Watch issued January 10 at 2:03PM CST until January 14 at 12:00AM CST by NWS Cheyenne
info.description: ...WIND CHILL WATCH IN EFFECT FROM FRIDAY AFTERNOON THROUGH SATURDAY EVENING... * WHAT...Dangerously cold wind chills possible. Wind chills as low as 40 below zero. * WHERE...In Nebraska, Scotts Bluff County and Morrill County. In Wyoming, East Platte County and Goshen County. * WHEN...From Friday evening through late Saturday evening. This ending time could be extended into later portions of the weekend at a later forecast update. * IMPACTS...The dangerously cold wind chills could cause frostbite on exposed skin in as little as 10 minutes. Exposed animals in the agricultural, farming, and ranching communities should have a plan to keep animals protected during this weekend.
info.instruction: Monitor the latest forecasts for updates on this situation.
